metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7938 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The ZeroMQ parser in tcpdump before 4.9.0 has an integer overflow in print-zeromq.c:zmtp1_print_frame().

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.0-1ubuntu1~ubuntu16.04.1').
